post.body: lucky you. I don't get to move there for at least another year.
my pecs are better than his. and how come it's okay for women to objectify him like that? he is not a piece of meat..
oh, that's how it goes. bitch away. mine likes to tell me I should call so-and-so family member more often. my response: why?!!
virgin America...
I was gonna say...yur bitching about the line and the cold as you stand in the line and the cold? hmmm...
candi can kiss my arse...if Public Affairs wasn't carefully disseminating 'spinettes', how would people know what to think?
ha!
ouch, bit terrifying cold you mean normal for chitown, bos, NYC or tdot cold, yes?
when I could go hang out with friends in Manhattan and Brooklyn and end up drunk in a ditch with a broken cigarette?
and, I do not like Queens! in fact I HATE Queens. except astoria. So why would I go to NYC to hang out in Queens with family...
i have a lot of friends in NYC that I like a lot more than most of my cousins/aunts&uncles in the area.
maybe its true. bcuz I do go to NYC a lot. I just don't go to visit them. but what? i'm supposed to be obligated to hang out with them?
christmas night bullshit: apparently, i avoid my NYC family members. why? bcuz i live so close and as have yet gone to visit. eyes. rolling.
wonders why people can't just admit that our 'spinster cousin' and her roommate of, I don't know, 30 years are lesbian life partners...
presently face deep in three ok d of cake. will need to workout 4 hours a day upon returning to DC
add cologne and $100 in iTunes certificates to the gift hall. guess they ward about my app store obsession
Christmas Dinner Report: Eating way too much ham. Present Report: $$$$$$
Why am I so lacking in holiday cheer? Will drink many cocktails this evening in an attempt I find some...
Errands and last minute shopping. Happy freaking holidays...
really, really, not loving the holidays. seriously, i would love nothing other than to not be here...
